subject: Child Abuse and Neglect
College Athletics
Football
Sex Crimes
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. will announce penalties against Penn State on Monday in the wake of the child sex abuse scandal involving Jerry Sandusky, a former football coach.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. will announce penalties against Penn State on Monday in the wake of the child sex abuse scandal involving Jerry Sandusky, a former football coach.
